extendedIngredients.name: blackberries
extendedIngredients.originalString: Fresh blackberries on a toothpick for garnish

extendedIngredients.name: blackberry jam
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 Tbsp seedless blackberry jam (I used Mackays Seedless Blackberry Preserves from World Market)
metaInformation: (I used Mackays Blackberry Preserves from World Market)

extendedIngredients.name: vanilla
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 tsp vanilla syrup ( homemade vanilla simple syrup or Torani)

recipes.title: Bride of Frankenstein Cocktail â€“ Vanilla Blackberry Champagne Cocktail
recipes.instructions: In a cocktail shaker stir together the jam and vanilla syrup until well mixed. Add ice and then thevodka and shake well.Strain the mixture evenly in two champagne flutes. Top with prosecco. Garnish with blackberries and serve immediately.

steps.step: In a cocktail shaker stir together the jam and vanilla syrup until well mixed.
Add ice and then thevodka and shake well.Strain the mixture evenly in two champagne flutes. Top with prosecco.
Garnish with blackberries and serve immediately.
